DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Triphasic CT, PET and MR Tumour With Pathological Findings in Colorectal Cancer Liver Metastases
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to correlate the MRI CT and PET appearances of colorectal liver metastases to pathologic appearance ot better understand the accuracy of imaging to determine tumor size.
DOC.criteria: liver metastases from colorectal cancer undergoing liver resection contraindication to CT, MRI or PET
